javelin.model.unit

Class Squad

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.world.WorldActor
      • javelin.model.unit.Squad
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Squad
extends WorldActor
    A group of units that the player controls as a overworld game unit. If a player loses all his squads the game ends.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • active

        public static Squad active
        See Javelin.act().

      • members

        public java.util.ArrayList<Combatant> members
        Which units are in this squad.

      • gold

        public int gold
        Gold pieces (currency). 1GP = 10 silver pieces. 1SP=10 copper pieces.

      • equipment

        public EquipmentMap equipment
        Items carried by each of the members. Since the BattleAi doesn't use items having this as a Squad filed is the best choice performance-wise.

      • hourselapsed

        public long hourselapsed
        Start at morning.

      • transport

        public Transport transport
        See Transport.

      • lasttown

        public Town lasttown
        Last visited town by a squad. Ideally this should always be a Town but in practice should never be null.

      • work

        public Improvement work
        See Work.

      • strategic

        public boolean strategic
        If true will skip all possible combats and resolve them automatically. TODO make it and Combatant.automatic super easy to change in the UI.

      • lastterrain

        public Terrain lastterrain
        Terrain type this squad is coming from after movement.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Squad

        public Squad(int xp,
             int yp,
             long hourselapsedp,
             Town lasttownp)
        Parameters:
        xp - Starting location (x).
        yp - Starting location (y).
        hourselapsedp - See hourselapsed.
        lasttownp - See lasttown.

    • Method Detail

      • disband

        public void disband()
        Removes this squad from the game, likely triggering Javelin.lose().

      • eat

        public float eat()
        Returns:
        The sum of Monster.eat() for this squad.

      • place

        public void place()
        Description copied from class: WorldActor
        Adds this actor to the game. Should only be used once in theory.
        Overrides:
        place in class WorldActor

      • updateavatar

        public void updateavatar()
        Updates WorldActor.visual, taking transport into account.

      • join

        public void join(Squad s)
        Parameters:
        s - Takes this squad, disband() it and join with the current instance.

      • turn

        public void turn(long time,
                 WorldScreen world)
        Description copied from class: WorldActor
        Called on each instance once per day.
        Overrides:
        turn in class WorldActor
        Parameters:
        time - Current hour, starting from hour zero at the beggining of the game.

      • dismiss

        public void dismiss(Combatant c)
        Removes a squad member and returns it to the MercenariesGuild if a mercenary.

      • add

        public void add(Combatant member,
                java.util.ArrayList<Item> equipmentp)
        Parameters:
        member - Adds this unit to members.
        equipmentp - Unit's equipment to be added to equipment.

      • remove

        public void remove(Combatant c)
        Parameters:
        c - Removes this unit and disband() if necessary.

public void receiveitem(Item key)

      • destroy

        public java.lang.Boolean destroy(Incursion incursion)
        Description copied from class: WorldActor
        Called when an incursion reaches this actor's location.
        Specified by:
        destroy in class WorldActor
        Returns:
        true if this place gets destroyed, false if the Incursion is destroyed or null if neither.
        See Also:
        Incursion#ignoreincursion(Incursion), Incursion.fight(int, int)

      • fly

        public boolean fly()
        Returns:
        true if all the squad can fly, false if at least one can fly or null otherwise.

      • know

        public int know()
        Returns:
        a Skills.knowledge roll.

      • perceive

        public int perceive(boolean flyingbonus)
        Returns:
        a Skills.perception roll.

      • hide

        public int hide()
        Note that this will use the lowest Hide rating found.
        Returns:
        A Skills#hide roll.
        See Also:
        hide(List)

      • spot

        public java.lang.String spot(java.util.List<Combatant> opponent)
        Returns:
        A list with the name of the given Combatants, replaced with "?" when failed to #perceive() properly.

      • hide

        public boolean hide(java.util.List<Combatant> foes)
        Represents a situation in which a group of hostile Combatant s is approaching this group. The foes must first be heard successfully and then a hide() attempt is performed.
        Returns:
        true if hide is successful and player gives input to stay hidden (confirmation).

      • bribe

        public boolean bribe(java.util.List<Combatant> foes)
        The squad tries to parley with the enemy Combatants, possibly bribing or hirimg them to avoid the fight.
        Returns:
        false if the fight is to proceed.

      • negotiate

        public int negotiate()
        Returns:
        A Skills.diplomacy roll.

      • search

        public int search()
        Returns:
        roll of Skills.search.

      • disarm

        public int disarm()
        Returns:
        roll of Skills.disabledevice

      • gossip

        public int gossip()
        Returns:
        roll of Skills.gatherinformation.

      • survive

        public int survive()
        Takes 10.
        Returns:
        a roll of Skills.survival.

      • ellapse

        public void ellapse(int timecost)
        Parameters:
        timecost - Updates hourselapsed and any side-effects.

      • move

        public float move(boolean ellapse)
        Returns:
        Like speed() but return time in hours.

      • speed

        public int speed()
        Returns:
        The land speed movement overland in miles per hour. This is the amount covered in an hour but the correspoinding movement per day is less since it has to account for sleep, resting, etc.

      • build

        public void build()
        Finishes the current work.

      • swim

        public boolean swim()
        A squad cannot move on water if any of the combatants can't swim. Alternatively a boat or airship will let non-swimming squads move on water.
        Returns:
        true if this squad can move on water.
        See Also:
        Monster.swim()

      • view

        public void view(int vision)
        Discover a World area in a radius around current position.
        Parameters:
        vision - Perceive roll with circumstance bonuses.
        See Also:
        WorldScreen.discovered, perceive(boolean)

      • getcombatants

        public java.util.List<Combatant> getcombatants()
        Specified by:
        getcombatants in class WorldActor
        Returns:
        Any combatants that are situated in this actor, may return null if this is not a valid request for this type of actor. For performance if a List is returned it should be the canonical one, and thus should not be directly modified by the receiver.
        See Also:
        Combatant.newid()
